transArray.content: The hotel is in a good location. There is a subway station nearby for easy travel. The room is clean, tidy and sanitary. The breakfast is quite rich. The hotel's service attitude is very good. They are patient and polite. Any needs are met immediately without delay at all. There are also toys, snacks and free fruits for children. There are free parking tickets, which is pretty good

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. We strive to make every guest happy to become a repeat customer. The hotel is located at Gate 2 East of Badili Automobile Park. Take Metro Line 6 and exit from Haidian Wuluju Station. It takes 3-5 minutes to walk directly to the hotel. We look forward to seeing you again. I wish you a happy life. General Manager: Li Changxia
